headline.main: SOVIET LISTS GAINS ON KALININ FRONT; Battle There Is Expected to Be Important Because Forces Are in Tangled Salients LULL REMAINS IN SOUTH Kharkov Fighting Is Believed to Have Destroyed Nazis Who Had Been on Way to Rostov

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, June 2 -- Although Soviet reports from the Kalinin sector emphasize that the engagements there are of local significance, the dispositions of the opposing forces are so complicated, with salient and counter-salient entangled, that any move there is worthy of close attention.
abstract: USSR lists Kalinin front gains; lull continues, southern section; Kharkov fighting believed to have destroyed German troops planning Rostov thrust; 47 planes downed, Leningrad; Germans rept mopping-up activities

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
